text: America Georgina Ferrera (born April 18, 1984) is an American movie, television, stage, and voice actress. She is best known for her role as Betty Suarez in Ugly Betty. For her role as Betty Suarez, she won an Golden Globe Award, Emmy Award, and an Screen Actors Guild Award. Ferrera was born on April 18, 1984 in Los Angeles, California. She studied at the University of Southern California. She is married to Ryan Piers Williams since 2011. Ferrera is a Democrat and attended the 2012 Democratic National Convention in support of President Obama's re-election. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1984 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:American stage actors Category:Democrats (United States) Category:Actors from Los Angeles Category:Golden Globe Award winning actors Category:Emmy Award winning actors Category:Screen Actors Guild Award winners
title: America Ferrera
